title: Priority Queue Reset, do I EVER get to be back to where I was.
body: I've been through the priority queue 3 times but I could go 30+ games without leaving once and each time I leave ONCE I increase my priority queue to another level, What is required to alleviate the 20 minutes IF it were to happen again because, Riot STUFF DOES COME UP. NO one can predict the future or know when their computer crash, even more trouble some is when the issue is RIOT'S servers. SO when do I get to reset that timer
